about_the_game:
Rhythm Dodge is a retro styled music based game where instead of hitting notes on the rhythm of the music you have to dodge them. You play as two sides that you control independently. Making you test your eye-hand coordination.



Move through varying patterns in levels with a variety of music, difficulty and colors while taking control of 2 sides, which you can decorate with unlockable skins, trails and colors, to beat your highscores. You only have a limited amount of hits you can take before you have to start over, so keep a lookout for healing items spread throughout the levels.



The game features plenty of accessibility options, allowing you to rebind keys, disable visual effects such as screenshake and enable toggled lane switching.

Once you are ready, head into the level select, where for a more challenging experience you can increase the speed of the level you want to play for a major score bonus.
